title: New Race Face Next SL handlebar drops to just 167g, flexes over bumps
content:
The Race Face Next SL carbon handlebar flexes, and that’s OK. All handlebars flex, especially carbon fiber ones. It’s the manner in which the Next SL carbon bar flexes that makes it worth taking a look. That, and it’s incredibly lightweight.
